title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', and 'd'.
OB: The obfuscated classes mentioned (a, a1, b, c, d, etc.) prominently appear in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that obfuscated classes are not displayed in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To address this issue, I suggest implementing either of the following options: 
a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter. 
b) Filter out the obfuscated classes completely.
